duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage repair and maintenance of equipment, work planning, and scheduling.
Provide training and assistance to field service technicians.
Handle customer complaints, promote safety awareness, and perform quality control checks.
Update, maintain, and organize equipment service records, as well as handle warranty claims and commissions for new equipment.
Orders parts, returns parts, performs parts inventory, and manages fleet status reporting.

education_certification.credential: Extensive experience in the repair and maintenance of diesel engines and/or electric motors. Knowledge of work planning and scheduling and other supervisory activities.
